title: The Old Guard
description: Four undying warriors who've secretly protected humanity for centuries become targeted for their mysterious powers just as they discover a new immortal.
starring: Charlize Theron, KiKi Layne, Marwan Kenzari

title: Naruto Shippuden: The Movie
description: The adventures of adolescent ninja Naruto Uzumaki continue as he's tasked with protecting a priestess from a demon -- but to do so, he must die.
starring: Junko Takeuchi, Chie Nakamura, Yoichi Masukawa

title: Hulk Vs.
description: This action-packed animated double feature pits the Hulk against two of the Marvel Universe's most powerful characters: Wolverine and Thor.
starring: Fred Tatasciore, Matthew Wolf, Graham McTavish

title: Mauli
description: An unconventional police officer faces off against a gang of thugs as he tries to bring order to the far-flung village he’s been stationed in.
starring: Riteish Deshmukh, Saiyami Kher, Jitendra Joshi

title: Pokémon the Movie: I Choose You!
description: When Ash tries to pick his first Pokémon on his birthday, he ends up with a stubborn Pikachu and they embark on a journey to find the legendary Ho-Oh.
starring: Ikue Otani, Sarah Natochenny, David Oliver Nelson

title: French Dirty
description: An aimless, unemployed millennial hangs out with his pals and resists growing up, until an affair with his best friend's girl forces him to change.
starring: Wade Allain-Marcus, Arjun Gupta, Melina Lizette

title: All About the Washingtons
description: Hip-hop icon MC Joe Speed retires from showbiz and finds a new rhythm balancing business, romance and everyday family chaos.
starring: Joseph Simmons, Justine Simmons, Kiana Ledé

title: Sons of the Caliphate
description: Three wealthy, power-hungry men tussle for sovereignty amid corrupt politics, passionate desires and family obligations.
starring: Yakubu Mohammed, Paul Sambo, Mofe Duncan

title: Fatal Affair
description: A lawyer is caught in a terrifying game of cat and mouse when a drink with an old friend escalates into an obsession that jeopardizes everyone she loves.
starring: Nia Long, Omar Epps, Stephen Bishop

title: Thomas & Friends: Marvelous Machinery: A New Arrival
description: With a technology fair in Sodor, Thomas and the Steam Team tackle a flurry of tasks — but can they complete their deliveries before the grand opening?
starring: Joseph May, Keith Wickham, Yvonne Grundy

title: Barbie: Princess Charm School
description: Blair Willows is excited when she gets to go to Princess Charm School, where she meets princesses Delancy and Hadley, and searches for a magic crown.
starring: Diana Kaarina, Morwenna Banks, Nicole Oliver

title: Welcome to Monster High: The Origin Story
description: Dracula's daughter Draculaura sets out to create a new kind of school where monsters of all kinds can be themselves and have a scary good time.
starring: Debi Derryberry, Cassandra Morris, Salli Saffioti

title: Krish Trish and Baltiboy: Face Your Fears
description: In three tales about fear, a baby elephant gets captured by a circus, two boys enter a haunted house and a parrot faces his fear of flying.
starring: Tarun Ratnani, Smita Malhotra, Deepak Chachra

title: Krish Trish and Baltiboy
description: A team of minstrels, including a monkey, cat and donkey, narrate folktales from the Indian regions of Rajasthan, Kerala and Punjab.
starring: Damandeep Singh Baggan, Smita Malhotra, Baba Sehgal

title: Krish Trish and Baltiboy: Part II
description: Animal minstrels narrate stories about a monkey's friendship with a crocodile, two monkeys' foolishness and a villager's encounter with a demon.
starring: Damandeep Singh Baggan, Smita Malhotra, Baba Sehgal

title: Krish Trish and Baltiboy: Best Friends Forever
description: A cat, monkey and donkey team up to narrate folktales about friendship from Northeast India, and the Indian regions of Bihar and Rajasthan.
starring: Damandeep Singh Baggan, Smita Malhotra, Deepak Chachra

title: Urzila Carlson: Overqualified Loser
description: Stand-up comedian Urzila Carlson keeps the crowd roaring with her thoughts on recasting "The Biggest Loser," sex tape regrets and boxed wine hangovers.
starring: Urzila Carlson

title: MILF
description: In the south of France, three best friends in their 40s navigate loss and heartbreak while embarking on steamy affairs with much younger men.
starring: Virginie Ledoyen, Marie-Josée Croze, Axelle Laffont

title: The Long Dumb Road
description: Bound for art school, a sheltered student gets roped into the antics of a freewheeling mechanic who hitches a ride after fixing his car.
starring: Tony Revolori, Jason Mantzoukas, Taissa Farmiga

title: Class Rank
description: When her class rank threatens her college plans, an ambitious teen convinces a nerdy peer to run for the school board to abolish the ranking system.
starring: Olivia Holt, Skyler Gisondo, Kristin Chenoweth

title: Suckseed
description: When his boyhood crush Ern returns, Ped forms a band with his friend to impress her. Romantic rivalries bloom after the talented Ern joins the group.
starring: Jirayu Laongmanee, Pachara Chirathivat, Nattasha Nauljam

title: The Clique
description: Arrogant Massie Block finds her life taking an unexpected turn when a family with a self-assured teenage daughter moves into the Blocks' guest house.
starring: Elizabeth McLaughlin, Ellen Marlow, Samantha Boscarino

title: I Love You
description: Tired of her passionless marriage, Marianne wants a separation from her husband, Gustav, who, in response, decides to make a big change of his own.
starring: Björn Kjellman, Christine Meltzer, Rodolfo Corsato

title: Mama's Boy
description: A man undergoes a heart transplant following a serious injury and begins to take on some of the donor's motherly characteristics.
starring: Hesham Maged, Shikoo, Mohammed Tharwat

title: Alelí
description: Mourning their father's death, a dysfunctional trio of siblings must face selling their beloved childhood beach house — and dealing with each other.
starring: Néstor Guzzini, Mirella Pascual, Cristina Morán

title: Natural Born Pranksters
description: The biggest pranksters on YouTube -- VitalyzdTV, Dennis Roady and Roman Atwood -- turn Hollywood into "Prankwood" with their most over-the-top stunts.
starring: Roman Atwood, Vitaly Zdorovetskiy, Dennis Roady

title: Adventures in Public School
description: After years of home-schooling, an awkward teen decides he wants a public high school experience, but his overbearing mother struggles to let go.
starring: Daniel Doheny, Judy Greer, Siobhan Williams

title: Guilty
description: When a college heartthrob is accused of rape by a less popular student, his girlfriend navigates various versions of the story in search of the truth.
starring: Kiara Advani, Akansha Ranjan Kapoor, Gurfateh Pirzada

title: The Millions
description: To pull off a massive heist, a charismatic con artist attempts to rob a fortified home with the help of a team he can't completely trust.
starring: Ramsey Nouah, Blossom Chukwujekwu, Ayo Makun

title: Thug Life
description: A get-rich-quick scheme goes awry when a group of friends stumbles onto a dangerous conspiracy and wind up getting mistaken for the bad guys.
starring: Harish Verma, Jass Bajwa, Rajiv Thakur

title: Mucho Mucho Amor: The Legend of Walter Mercado
description: Dazzling and tender-hearted, legendary astrologer Walter Mercado vanished at the peak of his fame. This documentary poignantly explains what happened.
starring: Walter Mercado

title: The Claudia Kishi Club
description: Asian American creatives pay passionate tribute to the iconic, stereotype-busting "Baby-Sitters Club" character in this heartfelt documentary short.

title: Father Soldier Son
description: After a single father is severely wounded in Afghanistan, he and his sons embark on a journey of sacrifice and a search for redemption.

title: Born Racer
description: In this all-access pass, IndyCar champion Scott Dixon and his team navigate the risks on the road in the quest to win it all.
starring: Scott Dixon

title: We Are One
description: Activists around the world fight injustice and drive social change in this documentary that follows their participation in the music video "Solidarité."

title: National Bird
description: Three former military operatives offer disturbing, firsthand accounts of the deadly impact that U.S. drone warfare has had on civilians overseas.

title: Theater of Life
description: This documentary follows chef Massimo Bottura as he opens a soup kitchen to cook gourmet meals for the needy from food waste at the 2015 Milan Expo.
starring: Massimo Bottura

title: Barbecue
description: A blend of cultural nuance and mesmerizing techniques adds flavor to this globe-hopping celebration of cooking, tradition and community.

title: Notes on Blindness
description: Based on the audio diaries of academic and theologian John Hull, this film offers an impressionistic re-creation of his slow descent into blindness.
starring: Dan Renton Skinner, Simone Kirby

title: Voulez-vous rire avec moi ce soir?
description: French humorist Yacine Belhousse tours the world to explore how stand-up comedians make audiences laugh across cultures.
starring: Gad Elmaleh, Eddie Izzard, Bill Burr

title: Pride & Prejudice
description: In Jane Austen's tale of 19th-century England, Mrs. Bennet hopes to marry her daughters to prosperous gentlemen, including new arrival Mr. Darcy.
starring: Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen, Brenda Blethyn

title: Hostiles
description: After a long career battling the Cheyenne, a U.S. Army captain is ordered to safely escort the tribe's most influential chief to his Montana homeland.
starring: Christian Bale, Rosamund Pike, Wes Studi

title: The Duel
description: In 1866, a Texas Ranger investigates some suspicious deaths in a town ruled by a religious despot whose past contains a disturbing link to his own.
starring: Woody Harrelson, Liam Hemsworth, Alice Braga

title: Before I Fall
description: Forced to continually relive the day she dies in a car crash, a privileged high schooler must unravel the cosmic mystery of her suddenly looping life.
starring: Zoey Deutch, Halston Sage, Erica Tremblay

title: Sylvia
description: When a man outgrows a childhood friendship and commits to marrying his girlfriend, obsession and spiritual warfare soon disrupt his peaceful life.
starring: Chris Attoh, Zainab Balogun, Ini Dima-Okojie

title: Tamasha
description: Meeting while on vacation, Ved and Tara sense a connection but vow to keep their real identities a secret. Years later, their paths cross again.
starring: Ranbir Kapoor, Deepika Padukone, Piyush Mishra

title: Bottom of the World
description: En route to a fresh start in Los Angeles, young couple Alex and Scarlett stop over in a sleepy Southwestern town that loosens their grip on reality.
starring: Jena Malone, Douglas Smith, Ted Levine

title: 7 años
description: Loyalties are tested and cruelties revealed when four business partners spend a tense evening debating who will pay for the crime they committed.
starring: Paco León, Juana Acosta, Juan Pablo Raba

title: Who Would You Take to a Deserted Island?
description: On their last night together, four longtime flatmates' lives are suddenly upended when a secret is revealed during the course of an evening celebration.
starring: María Pedraza, Jaime Lorente, Pol Monen

title: Cold Feet
description: At a resort getaway, the fate of two couples collides when a wife unexpectedly runs into an old flame as he hesitates to propose to his girlfriend.
starring: Jim Iyke, Joselyn Dumas, Enyinna Nwigwe

title: Hole in the Wall
description: Diagnosed with colon cancer, a free-spirited man embarks on an illuminating road trip with his son through South Africa.
starring: André Odendaal, Nicholas Campbell, Tinarie van Wyk Loots

title: Charlie St. Cloud
description: Ben Sherwood's intriguing novel is the basis of this ghost story about Charlie, who is devoted to his brother, Sam, even after Sam's death.
starring: Zac Efron, Charlie Tahan, Amanda Crew

title: Funan
description: Separated from their young son during the brutal Khmer Rouge revolution, a couple must find ways to endure while searching for their child.
starring: Bérénice Bejo, Louis Garrel, Colette Kieffer

title: Camera Store
description: With the digital revolution just around the corner, the employees of Bibideaux camera store strive to stay relevant amid unstoppable change.
starring: John Larroquette, John Rhys-Davies, Paul Ben-Victor

title: The Ant's Scream
description: Released after being wrongly imprisoned in Iraq, an Egyptian contractor returns home to a country on the brink of revolution.
starring: Amr Abdel-Geleel, Rania Yousef, Salloum Haddad

title: Blessed Benefit
description: After being wrongfully convicted of fraud, an honest man finds that life in prison comes with a measure of freedom that is unavailable outside.
starring: Ahmad Thaher, Maher Khammash, Odai Hijazi

title: Wakefield
description: An unhappy father and lawyer quits his suburban life and vanishes into the attic above his garage, where he watches his family move on without him.
starring: Bryan Cranston, Jennifer Garner, Jason O'Mara

title: Devil's Gate
description: Seeking a missing woman in North Dakota, an FBI agent and a sheriff focus on her religious zealot husband but discover something far more sinister.
starring: Amanda Schull, Milo Ventimiglia, Shawn Ashmore

title: Mythily Veendum Varunnu
description: After losing her father, a young woman moves to the city to earn money. When she finds a job at a mysterious bungalow, her worst nightmares come true.
starring: Shivani Bhai, Udhay, Kiran Raj

title: A Yellow Bird
description: In Singapore, a homeless ex-convict hoping to reunite with his family forms a bond with a Chinese sex worker while serving as her bodyguard.
starring: Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Huang Lu, Seema Biswas

title: Fireflies
description: Grappling with love and loss in their respective lives, two estranged brothers must confront their traumatic, unresolved past when they cross paths.
starring: Rahul Khanna, Arjun Mathur, Shivani Ghai

title: Mantra
description: An Indian business owner struggles to keep his company afloat amid global competition while trying to make up for lost time with his family.
starring: Rajat Kapoor, Lushin Dubey, Kalki Koechlin

title: Phullu
description: Struck by the lack of clean resources for menstruating women in his village, a jobless loafer braves social stigmas to create low-cost sanitary napkins.
starring: Sharib Hashmi, Nutan Surya, Jyotii Sethi

title: Belmonte
description: An artist muddles through a midlife crisis while trying to balance his dimming career with a yearning to be a better father.
starring: Gonzalo Delgado, Olivia Molinaro Eijo, Jeannette Sauksteliskis

title: Much Ado About Nothing
description: Carefree college student Vicente ends up in a desperate fight for freedom when a well-connected friend falsely accuses him of a hit-and-run accident.
starring: Agustín Silva, Paulina Garcia, Daniel Alcaíno

title: Paper Year
description: A young newlywed tries to keep her relationship afloat after developing feelings for her older, TV writer boss.
starring: Eve Hewson, Avan Jogia, Hamish Linklater

title: Rivaaz
description: In a village where girls are auctioned off rather than married, a man falls in love with a girl who is about to face the bidders.
starring: Deepti Naval, Vijay Raaz, Meghna Naidu

title: Nathicharami
description: Reeling from the loss of her husband, a widow struggles to fulfill her physical and emotional desires despite social taboos around female sexuality.
starring: Sruthi Hariharan, Sanchari Vijay, Sharanya

title: The Players
description: From campy lies to sexy surprises, this collection of vignettes captures the follies of several men as they fumble with fidelity and relationships.
starring: Valerio Mastandrea, Riccardo Scamarcio, Laura Chiatti

title: Your Excellency
description: Bumbling through politics, a billionaire businessman's presidential campaign seems destined for disaster until it gets a boost from social media.
starring: Akin Lewis, Funke Akindele, Kemi Lala Akindoju

title: Baazaar
description: A wide-eyed graduate learns the ugly side of ambition when he joins in the dubious business practices of his idol, a ruthless Mumbai stock tycoon.
starring: Saif Ali Khan, Chitrangada Singh, Radhika Apte

title: Warehoused
description: A soon-to-be-retiring Mr. Lino teaches 20-something Nin the strict rules of his new warehouse job in this dramedy about the absurdities of work life.
starring: José Carlos Ruiz, Hoze Meléndez

description: After a devastating earthquake hits Mexico City, trapped survivors from all walks of life wait to be rescued while trying desperately to stay alive.
starring: Demián Bichir, Héctor Bonilla, Oscar Serrano

title: Semana Santa
description: A single mother, her boyfriend and her 8-year-old son take a weeklong resort vacation, during which secrets and relationship strains take their toll.
starring: Tenoch Huerta, Anajosé Aldrete, Esteban Ávila

title: El club de los insomnes
description: An insomniac, an aspiring photographer and a pregnant veterinarian form a unique friendship during late-night meetings at a 24-hour mini-mart.
starring: Cassandra Ciangherotti, Leonardo Ortizgris, Alejandra Ambrosi

title: Los Herederos
description: Spurred by boredom and peer pressure, a group of suburban teens becomes increasingly violent and find their paths intersecting those of their parents.
starring: Máximo Hollander, Sebastián Aguirre, Úrsula Pruneda

title: Menahi
description: A stranger to civilian life, a young Saudi farmer travels to Dubai, where he experiences a series of hilarious misadventures.
starring: Fayez Al-Malki, Mona Wasef, Abdel Imam Abdullah

title: Lommbock
description: After finding love in drug-free Dubai, Stefan returns to Germany to grab documents for his wedding. But old buddy Kai's bad habits complicate things.
starring: Lucas Gregorowicz, Moritz Bleibtreu, Louis Hofmann

title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama 2
description: Three young bachelors find the reality of relationships to be far removed from the idea of true romance that they had once pursued.
starring: Kartik Aaryan, Nushrat Bharucha, Sonalli Sehgall

title: My Fuhrer
description: Germany's most celebrated actor is commissioned by Nazi propagandist Joseph Goebbels to prepare the leader of the Third Reich to deliver a speech.
starring: Helge Schneider, Ulrich Mühe, Sylvester Groth

title: Motichoor Chaknachoor
description: Pushing 40 and unemployed, a Dubai returnee desperate for a wife catches the eye of a Bhopal belle, who sees him solely as her ticket out of India.
starring: Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Athiya Shetty, Sanjeev Vats

title: Aiyyaa
description: An outspoken, imaginative girl from a conservative family pursues her dream man while fending off the prospect of an arranged marriage.
starring: Rani Mukerji, Prithviraj Sukumaran, Nirmiti Sawant

title: One by Two
description: The lives of a Mumbai man and woman who are both dealing with issues intersect through a TV dance show that she wants to win but he wants to sabotage.
starring: Abhay Deol, Preeti Desai, Lillete Dubey

title: Deewana Main Deewana
description: A man's instant attraction to a woman becomes an obsession as he adopts a friend's identity and even commits murder in order to get closer to her.
starring: Govinda, Priyanka Chopra, Kader Khan

title: World Famous Lover
description: When his frustrated girlfriend decides to leave him, a struggling writer gets down to work on stories of romance he hopes will win her back.
starring: Raashi Khanna, Vijay Deverakonda, Izabelle Leite

title: Beiimaan Love
description: After having her heart broken by a man who seduced her at a party, a young, ambitious woman concocts a scheme to get revenge.
starring: Sunny Leone, Rajneesh Duggal, Rajeev Verma

title: Namastey London
description: Distant from her Indian roots, a London-born woman plans to outwit her father when he arranges her marriage to a villager from the motherland.
starring: Akshay Kumar, Katrina Kaif, Rishi Kapoor

title: Hot Sweet Sour
description: In love since childhood, a couple separates to pursue different paths but makes a pact to marry each other in five years if they are still single.
starring: Buğra Gülsoy, Özge Özpirinçci, Yusuf Akgün

title: One Night Stand
description: An obsession with a woman with whom he had a one-night stand brings disharmony into a man's life and destroys his peace of mind.
starring: Tanuj Virwani, Sunny Leone, Narendra Jetley

title: What's Up With Love?
description: A popular high school girl strains her relationship with her close-knit clique when she begins falling for a reclusive, lower-class schoolmate.
starring: Dian Sastrowardoyo, Nicholas Saputra, Ladya Cheryll

title: Rajma Chawal
description: Hoping to revive his relationship with his resentful millennial son, an internet-rookie widower assumes the online persona of a young woman.
starring: Rishi Kapoor, Anirudh Tanwar, Amyra Dastur

title: Single
description: Unemployed and immature, a somewhat pathetic bachelor sets his sights on finding a date for the wedding of his younger, more successful brother.
starring: Raditya Dika, Annisa Rawles, Chandra Liow

title: Down to Earth with Zac Efron
description: Actor Zac Efron journeys around the world with wellness expert Darin Olien in a travel show that explores healthy, sustainable ways to live.
starring: Zac Efron, Darin Olien

title: Edmilson Filho: Notas, Comedy about Relationships
description: Brazilian comedian Edmilson Filho walks his audience through the stages of a modern relationship, playing up the differences between men and women.
starring: Edmilson Filho

title: Bill Hicks: One Night Stand
description: Bill Hicks remembers a wild night in 1989 and offers his views on puffing cigarettes, smoking weed, drinking, sex, commercials and music.
starring: Bill Hicks

title: Sam Kinison: Family Entertainment Hour
description: Comic Sam Kinison lets it rip with this performance at L.A.'s Wiltern theatre, skewering every segment of modern society from religion to television.
starring: Sam Kinison

title: Only Mine
description: After dating a charming cop who turns into an obsessive stalker, a small-town girl must save herself from his deadly ways.
starring: Amber Midthunder, Brett Zimmerman, Chris Browning

title: Running Out of Time
description: Held hostage by men searching for a secret her late husband left behind, a recent widow and her family race against time to find a way out.
starring: Tasha Smith, RonReaco Lee, Telma Hopkins

title: Two Graves
description: A doctor and a drug addict kidnap the son of a local gangster, seeking revenge for the death of a loved one.
starring: Cathy Tyson, Katie Jarvis, David Hayman
